<Heading

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"user":{"type":"string","description":"The user ID of the user joining the room"},"room":{"type":"string","description":"The room ID of the room to join"},"is_invited":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the user is invited to the room"}},"required":["user","room","is_invited"],"example":{"user":"@example:example.com","room":"!example:example.com","is_invited":true}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
